input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareVCloud

items The items XML used to retrieve items from vCloud.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <operation-name>...</operation-name> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>
version The VMware vCloud Express API version. The current supported versions are v1.0, v1.5 and v5.1

The input for different operations that can be performed for version 1.0, 1.5 and 5.1
Get Catalog Item Details = Get_Catalog_Item_Details Get Catalog Details = Get_Catalog_Details Get Organization List = Get_Organization_List Get Organization Details = Get_Organization_Details Get vApp Configuration = Get_vApp_Configuration Get vApp Template Configuration = Get_vApp_Template_Configuration Acquire vApp Screen Ticket = Acquire_vApp_Screen_Ticket Acquire vApp Access Control Information = Acquire_vApp_Access_Control_Information Get vDC Details = Get_vDC_Details Get Task Status = Get_Task_Status Get Organization Network Details = Get_Organization_Network_Details Get Task List = Get_Task_List Get vApp Template OVF Descriptor = Get_vApp_Template_Ovf_Descriptor Get VM Network Connection = Get_VM_Network_Connection Get VM Guest Customization Section = Get_VM_Guest_Customization_Section Get VM Operating System Section = Get_VM_Operating_System_Section Get VM CPU Configuration = Get_VM_CPU_Configuration Get VM Virtual Hardware Section = Get_VM_Virtual_Hardware_Section Get VM Memory Item From Virtual Hardware Section = Get_VM_Memory_Item_From_Virtual_Hardware_Section Get VM Virtual Disk Items = Get_VM_Virtual_Disk_Items Get VM Network Card Items = Get_VM_Network_Card_Items Get VM Removable Media Drive Items = Get_VM_Removable_Media_Drive_Items

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <vcloud-organization></vcloud-organization> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

call-process.process-name: :AO-AD-VMware_VCloud:v1.0:VM_Management_Operations:Get VM Memory Item From Virtual Hardware Section
:AO-AD-VMware_VCloud:v5.1:VM_Management_Operations:Get VM Memory Item From Virtual Hardware Section

documentation.description:
Retrieve Items Retrieve items from the VCloud.
Get Catalog Item Details Get Catalog Details Get Organization List Get Organization Details Get vApp Configuration Get vApp Template Configuration Acquire vApp Screen Ticket Acquire vApp Access Control Information Get vDC Details Get Task Status Get Organization Network Details Get Task List Get vApp Template OVF Descriptor Get VM Network Connection Get VM Guest Customization Section Get VM Operating System Section Get VM CPU Configuration Get VM Virtual Hardware Section Get VM Memory Item From Virtual Hardware Section Get VM Virtual Disk Items Get VM Network Card Items Get VM Removable Media Drive Items
